attributes.action: Reconsider the proposed introduction of insurance for all dog owners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that if you pass this there will be more and more pets abandoned, also there are many people out of work who simply could not afford to pay for insurance and are struggling to feed thier pets as it is, the only people cashing in will be the insurance brokers and the government taking tax, this is ridiculous and will never work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
